text: Yeah, it's not that often when I don't listen to music while driving. It's one of the reasons why the, the other reason why the Car Play is really nice. I mean, I had Bluetooth on my old stereo which was great, but it's just way easier to interact with the music on this. So, like once we get on to... How about this, I can play a little music and like show you what it's like once we get onto 579 South?
